key.name: favorites
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for favorite applications
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the favorites panel along with running applications.

key.name: app-filter-mode
key.summary: How to filter apps in the overview. The default 'adaptive' shows only adaptive apps in mobile mode and all apps in docked mode. 'off' turns of all filtering.
key.description: Whether to filter out apps that aren't marked as adaptive in mobile mode.

key.name: force-adaptive
key.summary: List of desktop file IDs for applications that are adaptive for phone usage but not marked as such in their desktop file.
key.description: The applications corresponding to these identifiers will be displayed in the app grid panel even when in mobile mode that only lists touch capable apps that adapt to small screen sizes.

key.name: wwan-backend
key.summary: Which backend to use for interfacing with the cellular modem
key.description: The available backends are 'modemmanager' for ModemManager (the default) and 'ofono' for oFono. This setting is only read when Phosh starts, so a shell restart is required after changing it.

key.name: automatic-high-contrast
key.summary: Whether to switch to HighContrast theme in high brightness conditions
key.description: Setting this to true enables automatic switching to HighContrast on high ambient night levels.

key.name: automatic-high-contrast-threshold
key.summary: The light level (in Lux) to switch to HighContrast theme
key.description: When automatic high contrast is enabled this defines the light level at which to switch.

key.name: enable-suspend
key.summary: Whether to enable suspend from the power menu
key.description: Setting this to true allows manually suspending the device from the power menu. Suspend is an experimental feature on some devices and may result in crashes or instability.

key.name: quick-silent
key.summary: Allow to quickly silence the device
key.description: Setting this to true allows to set the phone to silent by pressing volume-down on incoming calls when the phone is locked. This feature is experimental.

key.name: shell-layout
key.summary: What information to use to layout UI elements.
key.description: This determines if Phosh will use device information to layout UI elements in order to not overlap with notches and cutouts.

key.name: osk-unfold-delay
key.summary: OSK unfold long press delay factor
key.description: Delay factor for long press on the home bar to unfold the keyboard. Valid values are [0.5,2.0]. Values less than 1.0 make the unfold trigger sooner, greater than 1.0 make the unfold trigger later.

key.name: enabled
key.description: When this is disabled the shell will not offer emergency call functionality.

key.name: shuffle-keypad
key.description: Setting this to true shuffle the digits on the PIN keypad to make eavesdropping harder.

key.name: wakeup-screen-triggers
key.summary: What notification properties wake up the screen
key.description: This setting defines what properties of a notification wake up the screen. (e.g. the notification's category or urgency).

key.name: wakeup-screen-categories
key.summary: Notification categories that wake up the screen
key.description: If matching by category is enabled defines which categories will wake up the screen.

key.name: wakeup-screen-urgency
key.summary: Notification urgency that wakes up the screen
key.description: If matching by urgency is enabled sets the lowest notification urgency that wakes up the screen.

key.name: lock-screen
key.description: The list of currently enabled plugins on the lock screen.

key.name: quick-settings
key.summary: List of enabled quick setting plugins
key.description: The list of currently enabled plugins on the quick settings box.
